description:
* Based on the PlayStation 2 romance simulation game Amagami by http://anidb.net/cr1279 [Enterbrain].
http://anidb.net/ch17012 [Tachibana Jun`ichi], a second-year high school student, always feels depressed around Christmas time due to a certain past experience. And because of his fear of opening his heart to love, his school life is rather lonely.
One day, Tachibana asks himself if he is really satisfied with ending his high school life in such a pathetic way? Setting aside his fears, Tachibana determines that he will spend the coming Christmas with a girl.
Thus resolved, he goes on to meet many different girls. In the end, what will Christmas hold for Tachibana?
~ translated and adapted from the official Japanese site by Cranston

REGULAR.description:
Junichi, a second-year in high school, has been wary of love ever since a date that never happened. However, when he runs into the school idol, Haruka, he`s smitten.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 森島はるか編 第一章 アコガレ

REGULAR.description:
Being unable to sleep last night, Junichi goes to the nurse`s office to rest - only to find Haruka lying there. They talk for a bit, and Junichi comes to a decision.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 森島はるか編 第二章 セッキン

REGULAR.description:
One day while talking in the hallway, Junichi suddenly gets pulled along by Haruka. It turns out she`s gotten jealous seeing him talk to other girls...
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 森島はるか編 第三章 ヤキモチ

REGULAR.description:
Junichi runs into Haruka at the arcade, and takes her to the park. There, he makes up his mind to ask her on a date on Christmas Eve. What will be her answer?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 森島はるか編 最終章 レンアイ

REGULAR.description:
Junichi and his friend Kaoru are joking around as always, but she punches him a bit too hard. Kaoru then says she wants to meet after school - could it be a love confession?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 棚町薫編 第一章 アクユウ

REGULAR.description:
A meaningful discussion between Junichi and Kaoru turns into a kiss, the first for both of them. As Kaoru later heads to work, Junichi reflects on how cute she is.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 棚町薫編 第二章 トマドイ

REGULAR.description:
The first bell rings, but Kaoru is nowhere to be found. Junichi goes out searching, and when he finds her, she reveals something shocking she`d learned about her mother.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 棚町薫編 第三章 ウラギリ

REGULAR.description:
Junichi heads to the nurse`s office for a Band-Aid, and finds Kaoru there. The two talk, and Junichi asks her if she has any plans for Christmas Eve.  Her answer?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 棚町薫編 最終章 シンテン

REGULAR.description:
Junichi is looking for his lost wallet when a girl named Sae returns it to him. He tries to thank her, but she suddenly leaves. Junichi sets off, determined to thank her.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 中多紗江編 第一章 コウハイ

REGULAR.description:
Junichi decides to help Sae prepare for her upcoming job interview. After school, he calls her to the Science Room for some special, additional training - speed changing.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 中多紗江編 第二章 トックン

REGULAR.description:
Sae`s long period of training comes to an end, and she finally decides to go for a job interview. Upon hearing this, Junichi offers to go with her. What will be the outcome?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 中多紗江編 第三章 ヘンカク

REGULAR.description:
Having successfully passed her job interview, Sae sets her sight on her next goal: the "Best Couple Contest" at the Founder`s Festival.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 中多紗江編 最終章 コイビト

REGULAR.description:
Junichi and his friend Masayoshi are heading home when they see a girl in the park jump off her swing. The girl, Ai Nanasaki, accuses them of looking where they shouldn`t be.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 七咲逢編 第一章 サイアク

REGULAR.description:
Junichi heads to the library, having heard about a cute librarian there, and ends up running into Ai. She`s studying for makeup exams, and Junichi is happy to help.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 七咲逢編 第二章 トキメキ

REGULAR.description:
Junichi receives some tickets to a theme park, and he invites Ai and her younger brother Ikuo. But on the day of, Ai shows up alone.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 七咲逢編 第三章 ヘンシン

REGULAR.description:
It`s the day of the Founder`s Festival, and Junichi is helping the girls` swim team man their stall. Afterward, Ai suggests the two go off somewhere together.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 七咲逢編 最終章 コクハク

REGULAR.description:
One morning, Rihoko Sakurai takes a shortcut to school and ends up getting stuck in a fence. Luckily, her childhood friend Junichi is there to help.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 桜井梨穂子編 第一章 オモイデ

REGULAR.description:
Rihoko, Junichi, and some friends go ice-skating to have fun, not realizing it`s part of a plan to get the two old friends together.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 桜井梨穂子編 第二章 テツダイ

REGULAR.description:
It`s the day after the Founder`s Festival, and the group goes out to eat. There, Rihoko decides to ask Junichi if he`ll visit a shrine with her on New Year`s Eve.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 桜井梨穂子編 第三章 ヒキツギ

REGULAR.description:
While struggling to find new members for the Tea Club Rihoko is able to spend Valentine`s Day with Junichi.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 桜井梨穂子編 最終章 サヨナラ

REGULAR.description:
Junichi decides to volunteer to help with the upcoming Founder`s Festival to get over his experience from Christmas Eve two years ago.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 絢辻詞編 第一章 ハッケン

REGULAR.description:
Class 2-A representative Tsukasa Ayatsuji sees Junichi holding her day planner and is convinced he saw something he shouldn`t have.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 絢辻詞編 第二章 ウラガワ

REGULAR.description:
Preparations for the Founder`s Festival are running behind, so Junichi pitches in and asks others to help. Just then, a classmate says Tsukasa is the reason for the delay...
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 絢辻詞編 第三章 プライド

REGULAR.description:
The Founder`s Festival rolls around but Tsukasa looks downtrodden, making Junichi worry. After getting some advice, he makes a certain decision.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 絢辻詞編 最終章 ヤクソク

REGULAR.description:
Junichi accepts the confession of a shy girl named Risa and takes her to the festival to introduce her. What he doesn`t know is that she`s been keeping a secret…
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 上崎裡沙編 シンジツ

SPECIAL.description: Tachibana Mia is afraid that her unreliable and perverted brother Jun`ichi will become a total failure in life, and never get a girlfriend. She`s quite surprised that her classmates Ai and Sae tell her otherwise, both confirming they consider Jun`ichi a nice guy. Thus Mia begins to spy on her brother, learning about even more girls he`s quite friendly to, but none of them being a potential girlfriend. A horrible idea comes to her mind: Could it be that Jun`ichi actually likes boys?

titles.title: 橘美也編 イモウト

SPECIAL.description:
Part 1: Jun`ichi and Haruka visit a family restaurant together; Jun`ichi is worried what his classmate Kaoru might think as she`s a waitress in this restaurant. After Jun`ichi confirmed he`s okay with sweet food, Haruka orders the Shining Lovers Parfait which she want to eat together.
Part 2: Christmas is near. As Kaoru said she has to work today, Jun`ichi is heading home alone but then decides to take a detour to the book shop. On the way he runs across a stall where a girl in a sexy Santa outfit sells Christmas cakes - and it`s Kaoru! Jun`ichi is entranced by Kaoru`s costume, but when he`s caught looking at her thighs she imposes a penalty for his misbehavior.
Part 3: It`s early December; Jun`ichi is sitting all alone at home on his birthday. Then the doorbell rings: It`s Sae-chan, and she`s not looking for her classmate Miya but for her "instructor". And she even brought a present for the boy.

titles.title: Morishima Haruka Chapter / Tanamachi Kaoru Chapter / Nakata Sae Chapter
Morishima Haruka Hen / Tanamachi Kaoru Hen / Nakata Sae Hen
森島はるか編 / 棚町薫編 / 中多紗江編
모리시마 하루카 편 / 타나마치 카오루 편 / 나카타 사에 편

SPECIAL.description:
Part 1: After Ai has failed to be selected for the swimming competition team, Jun`ichi attempts to cheer her up. So they meet at the staircase, and then the boy has a surprise in mind that Ai isn`t particular fond of.
Part 2: Rihoko has recruited her first new club member as Tea Club president; Jun`ichi teases her about having gained weight once again. Jun`ichi drops an item that turns out to be his new high-tech nail clipper. Showing off with his grand item, Jun`ichi offers to clip Rihoko`s nails.
Part 3: Tsukasa and Jun`ichi are heading home from their preparations for the school festival. Suddenly Tsukasa detects a sweet smell in the air coming from a van offering freshly baked melon bread. Tsukasa returns with a huge load of melon bread that she got for free; as Jun`ichi`s hands are carrying lots of materials, Tsukasa offers to feed him.

Nanasaki Ai Hen / Sakurai Rihoko Hen / Ayatsuji Tsukasa Hen
